display_long_description:
# Build, Ride, & Share Rollercoasters in Mixed Reality!
Create and ride thrilling rollercoasters in your own space with **CoasterMania**! Use physics-based tools to design jaw-dropping tracks that adapt to your room, then hop in the front seat for a first-person ride like no other.
[media]


# Campaign Mode
Complete over 50 puzzles across four themed worlds—Medieval, Western, Atlantis, and Sci-Fi. Solve challenges, unlock cosmetics, and master the art of coaster-building!
[media]

# Sandbox Mode
Turn your room into a coaster playground! Build tracks through your space with gadgets like cannons, rocket propellers, and portals. Decorate with props, sculpt terrain, and experience your creations in VR, zipping around furniture and even your pets.
[media]

# Showcase Mode
Share your coasters and ride creations from players around the world!

Bring your imagination to life—your living room is now a theme park!

# Build, Ride, & Share Rollercoasters in Mixed Reality!
Create and ride thrilling rollercoasters in your own space with **CoasterMania**! Use physics-based tools to design jaw-dropping tracks that adapt to your room, then hop in the front seat for a first-person ride like no other.

# Campaign Mode
Complete over 50 puzzles across four themed worlds—Medieval, Western, Atlantis, and Sci-Fi. Solve challenges, unlock cosmetics, and master the art of coaster-building!
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974856_1092357931949031_1560115808254071601_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=VRSzUStx_5oQ7kNvwE07a_m&_nc_oc=AdkPWSOvkGngk5ApFj8yS34L4bsdSWTaoTU3RQXtT7Opn17wrjQcAG0nw9E_3h7c_8o&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=wpx-5kcEa5zBk-xXmtD3dA&oh=00_AftYoVF_FwyQGSgsfnM3zPSSV3NJ90A8l6gH2KUPeh5WPw&oe=6994DBA6)

# Sandbox Mode
Turn your room into a coaster playground! Build tracks through your space with gadgets like cannons, rocket propellers, and portals. Decorate with props, sculpt terrain, and experience your creations in VR, zipping around furniture and even your pets.

# Showcase Mode
Share your coasters and ride creations from players around the world!

Bring your imagination to life—your living room is now a theme park!
